hello.text: Hello, Koishi. I think there is something wrong with me ?

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: Sleepy. Actually, I have felt drained out for ages now.

what.name: What happened to you ?
what.text: Well, it's this time of the month again. It is erupting.

what.name: It happens every month you say ?
what.text: Well sometimes it is the opposite and it's a nuclear winter.{n}Usually it ends up with me being somehow gapped{n}to space and giving birth to a new star.{s}

check.name: Check her up
check.narrator: {i}She sweats, but it looks like the droplets{n}vaporize almost instantaneously.{n}You touch her skin... Ouch ! She's burning !{s}

mindread.name: Read her subconscious
mindread.narrator: {i}You can feel the Yatagarasu. It looks like there is an eruption ongoing.{s}

temperature.name: Take her temperature
temperature.narrator: {i}She is definitely hotter than usual, that's for sure.{n}Now, you know exactly how cold she needs to get.{s}

stare.name: Stare at her
stare.narrator: {i}Staring is quite a bold move, seeing she is currently radiating.{n}You become blind.{s}

absorb.name: Absorb some of the energy
absorb.narrator: {i}You absorb some of the radiations{n}It damages your DNA, but thanks to your ability, you can repair it easily.n}Utsuho should be less unstable now.{s}

nuclear.name: Try to tickle her
nuclear.narrator: {i}A chain reaction starts and she goes nuclear.{n}Quite a way to make hell great again !{s}

operate.name: Try operating her to take the Yatagarasu out
operate.narrator: {i}You open up Utsuho and try to dislodge the Yatagarasu core from her body.{n}Sadly, before you manage to complete the procedure, her heart stops...{s}

punch.name: Use a spellcard
punch.narrator: {i}She bombs it.{n}You manage to escape the blackhole by sheer luck.{n}It seems she at least cooled off.{s}

water.name: Lead her to the Misty Lake to cool her off
water.narrator: {i}The lake is surprisingly frozen !{n}That's even better than expected.{n}It looks like the nuclear core colled off... For now.{s}
